author: ajsutton
content: Important to note that sync performance is not indicative of performance once you're in sync.  There's a number of optimisations which only apply during sync and the general performance profile is quite different.  Teku hasn't focussed on those optimisations because we implemented snapshot sync which lets you get a new node up and fully sync'd in under a minute. ðŸ™‚
